document: THE DEMOGRAPHY OF A THAI VILLAGE: METHODOLOGICAL CONSIDERATIONS AND SUBSTANTIVE CONCLUSIONS FROM FIELD STUDY IN A CENTRAL PLAINS COMMUNITY by DONALD J. LAURO Thesis submitted in partial fulfilment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy at the Research School of Social Sciences, The Australian National University, Canberra, Australia.
